feed.title: CTV, APO, CAT activity on signet

entry.title: CTV, APO, CAT activity on signet
entry.summary: The crux of the discussion revolves around the mechanism utilized for detecting financial transactions as opposed to the generation of outputs. This distinction signifies that the focus is primarily on identifying and monitoring expenditure rather than the creation or production of outputs or results. This approach underscores a financial tracking perspective, emphasizing the importance of oversight on where funds are allocated and used, rather than assessing the tangible or intangible outcomes resulting from these expenditures.
